Seven days

THE FATHERHOOD SURF EXPERIENCE

Ocean Dad's and Salty kids who are addicted to the SLIDE.

We are Showcasing a community of Dad's and their kids who are doing it right. The ocean plays a huge role in the lives of coastal families, so we are decicated to highlighting the bond between a father and his kids, and their time in the ocean.


- LIVE SIMPLY AND GET SALTY -

Surf every day with your grom

Nothing beats spending time surfing with your son or daughter.

Quality time with your kids

Quality time together that you will all remember for a lifetime.

Meet other like-minded people

Meet other likeminded Dad's and their kids while you are here.

Travel together and explore Bali

We will show you around Bali and have new experiences together.

We are inspired by the ocean, waves and surfing. Our goal is to highlight the epic Dad's that dedicate their lives to shaping the future of our little beach groms. Allow us to take you on a mind surfing journey.


- SURF TOGETHER AND SURF OFTEN -
